title: FS 1910 Piedmont T206 Izzy Hoffman Authentic
author: Northviewcats

posts.post_title: FS 1910 Piedmont T206 Izzy Hoffman Authentic
posts.post_content:
Hello Everyone,

I have this 1910 Piedmont T206 of Izzy Hoffman for sale. SGC A. No creases. Centered.

Price: $29.95 delivered.

Paypal, check, or money order are all okay.

Thanks for looking,

Joe
Any idea why it got an A?

Don't know why it received the A. SGC didn't provide a reason for the grade when they returned it to me. Probably for being trimmed, maybe across the top edge, but it does measure okay 1 7/16 by 2 5/8. Its a well-centered card so would display very well in a raw collection.

Hope this helps.

Joe
